messages.content: scrivi una pagina HTML che permette di selezionare un colore tra una lista di 5. Quando l'utente sceglie il colore cambia il colore dello sfondo con quel colore

<html>
<head>
  <style>
    body {
      background-color: #000000;
    }

    select {
      background-color: #c000f0;
      background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #c000f0, #ffffff);
      background-image: -o-linear-gradient(top, #c000f0, #ffffff);
      background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #c000f0, #ffffff);
      background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, #c000f0, #ffffff);
      background-repeat: repeat-x;
      border: 1px solid #5f5f5f;
      color: #ffffff;
      font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
      font-size: 14px;
      font-weight: bold;
      padding: 6px;
    }

    select:focus {
      background-color: #c0c0ff;
      background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #c0c0ff, #ffffff);
      background-image: -o-linear-gradient(top, #c0c0ff, #ffffff);
      background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #c0c0ff, #ffffff);
      background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, #c0c0ff, #ffffff);
      background-repeat: repeat-x;
      border: 1px solid #5f5f5f;
      color: #ffffff;
      font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
      font-size: 14px;
      font-weight: bold;
      padding: 6px;
    }

    select:hover {
      background-color: #aaff00;
      background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #aaff00, #ffffff);
      background-image: -o-linear-gradient(top, #aaff00, #ffffff);
      background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #aaff00, #ffffff);
      background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, #aaff00, #
write an HTML page that allows you to select a color from a list of 5. When the user chooses the color, change the background color to that color

<html>
<head>
  <style>
    body {
      background-color: #000000;
    }

    select {
      background-color: #c000f0;
      background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #c000f0, #ffffff);
      background-image: -o-linear-gradient(top, #c000f0, #ffffff);
      background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #c000f0, #ffffff);
      background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, #c000f0, #ffffff);
      background-repeat: repeat-x;
      border: 1px solid #5f5f5f;
      color: #ffffff;
      font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
      font-size: 14px;
      font-weight: bold;
      padding: 6px;
    }

      background-image: -o-linear-gradient(top, #c0c0ff, #ffffff);
      background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #c0c0ff, #ffffff);
      background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, #c0c0ff, #ffffff);
      background-repeat: repeat-x;
      border: 1px solid #5f5f5f;
      color: #ffffff;
      font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
      font-size: 14px;
      font-weight: bold;
      padding: 6px;
